section.p: With a terrifying screech, a blazing creature drops directly out of the sky. It collides with a tree, throwing up a fountain of white sparks, and rebounds towards you. You catch a fleeting glimpse of a slavering muzzle, muscular body, and wet fur engulfed in dazzling light. Then it strikes.

If you are a Priest, turn immediately to 208.
Otherwise you must fight this creature.

When it hits you, reduce the damage inflicted by 1 for every 1000 Shards you are carrying. (This is because its electrical attacks are dissipated by strings of cash.) [Your Defence has been temporarily increased by this amount instead --Ed]
If you kill the thunder beast, it vanishes in a mass of hissing sparks; .
